Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Yates
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, South Shore, 75th, Yates, and 79th  due to, street blockage near 79th/Yates.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, South Shore, 75th, Yates, and 79th  due to, street blockage near 79th/Yates.

Allow extra travel time.
